title: Ripple Prime Is the Fintech Firm’s One-Stop Institutional Trading and Financing Desk
contentSnippet: Ripple Prime bundles trading, financing and clearing for institutions in one service, with risk controls, regulated custody and optional RLUSD collateral.

title: Rumble partners with Tether to add Bitcoin tips for content creators
contentSnippet: Video sharing platform Rumble has teamed up with Tether to help it add Bitcoin tips to content creators, expected to launch in early to mid-December.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves $133 Million Worth of Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's space exploration firm, SpaceX, moved $133 million worth of Bitcoin on Friday after transferring funds earlier this week.

title: Bitcoin miners build on gains after Jane Street discloses stakes
contentSnippet: Shares of leading Bitcoin mining companies rose after Jane Street disclosed new holdings on Thursday, extending a months-long rally across publicly traded mining stocks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Trump to nominate SEC's 'pro-crypto' Michael Selig as CFTC chair: Report
contentSnippet: The rumored nomination of Michael Selig follows the CFTC nomination process hitting a snag in September when Brian Quintenz was withdrawn.

title: Trump Picks SEC Crypto Task Force’s Mike Selig to Run CFTC: Report
contentSnippet: Selig, chief counsel for the SEC’s pro-crypto task force, is the president’s latest choice to run the CFTC, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Bitcoin price compression will spark expansion: Will BTC explode toward $120K?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin sellers put a cap on $112,000, but technical, onchain data and the end of October US macroeconomic calendar suggest that the price compression will trigger a violent expansion.

title: Public Keys: DraftKings Gets Predictable, Canaan Turns Around and Zelle Likes Stables
contentSnippet: DraftKings buys Railbird, Canaan rebounds from near-delisting, and Zelle embraces stablecoins in this week's Public Keys.

title: Custodia, Vantage Expand Pilot Into Live Tokenized Deposit Network for US Banks
contentSnippet: The two banks have moved from pilot to production with a platform that lets U.S. lenders issue interoperable tokenized deposits compliant with the GENIUS Act.

title: Coinbase stock surges after JPMorgan upgrade on Base, USDC potential
contentSnippet: JPMorgan sees Coinbase unlocking billions through its Base layer-2 network and USDC rewards overhaul, lifting its price target and fueling a sharp stock rally.

title: YouTube Rival Rumble Teams With Tether to Add Bitcoin Tipping for Creators
contentSnippet: Publicly traded video sharing and livestream platform Rumble is adding Bitcoin tipping for its creator base.

title: Binance comeback? CZ’s pardon reignites talk of a US return
contentSnippet: US President Donald Trump said Binance founder Changpeng Zhao had "a lot of support" from the crypto industry and was widely recommended for a pardon.

title: Gold vs Ethereum: Which Hits $5K First? Here’s What the Charts Say
contentSnippet: Ethereum needs a 30% pump while gold requires 20% to reach $5K. But predicting which crosses the finish line first isn't as easy as that. Here's why.

title: Sygnum Bank bets on Bitcoin lending with multisign custody model
contentSnippet: The new product is expected to launch in the first half of 2026 and will let clients borrow fiat against Bitcoin held in multisignature wallets.

title: Crypto Biz: Bitcoin whales trade keys for comfort
contentSnippet: Early BTC whales shift to ETFs, giving up keys for TradFi perks, as BlackRock conversions rise and onchain self-custody breaks a 15-year uptrend.

title: Spooky Szn? Bitcoin Options Worth Record $31 Billion Set to Expire on Halloween
contentSnippet: Despite the October flash crash and deleveraging event, Bitcoin traders are in for a record options expiry event at the end of the month. Here's what to expect.

title: Price predictions 10/24: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE, LINK, XLM
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bounced off the $107,000 support, but the recovery is expected to face significant resistance in the $112,000 to $116,000 zone. Do charts point to any altcoins taking the lead?

title: Payments Processor Zelle to Use Stablecoins for International Transactions
contentSnippet: The initiative reflects stablecoins' rising significance in the financial services world.

title: Blockchain.com Gains Malta MiCA License as Company Eyes European Expansion
contentSnippet: The crypto firm is the latest to seek a MiCA license in Malta, as EU regulators raise concerns about uneven supervision across member states.

title: Tether Eyes Fresh Investments to Push USAT Stablecoin to 100M Americans at December Launch
contentSnippet: Tether plans to launch its U.S.-compliant stablecoin USAT in December, aiming for mass reach in the creator economy, CEO Paolo Ardoino said in a CoinDesk interview.

title: Polymarket Will Launch Token and Airdrop After U.S. Relaunch, CMO Says
contentSnippet: "There will be a token, there will be an airdrop," CMO said as the platform nears an official U.S. return via a regulated exchange.

title: Stellar’s XLM Consolidates After Breakout as Volume Surge Hints at Institutional Activity
contentSnippet: XLM advanced 2.5% over 24 hours, breaking above key resistance on a 350% volume spike before easing into consolidation near $0.321, maintaining its broader uptrend structure.

title: Crypto.com Files for National Bank Charter Following Circle, Stripe and Coinbase
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Crypto.com is the latest firm to apply for a national bank trust charter, joining a list that includes Coinbase and Circle.

title: HBAR Slides 1.7% to $0.170 as Channel Support Crumbles
contentSnippet: Hedera’s token faces selling pressure after a failed breakout near $0.1716, with technical patterns signaling potential institutional distribution.

title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Gets Price Target Cut at Citi, While Bullish Earns Hike
contentSnippet: Gemini’s trading growth is slowing despite strong card sign-ups and app downloads, said Citigroup, while Bullish momentum is accelerating.

title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Reclaims $110K as Softer CPI Boosts Market Sentiment, Altcoins Lag
contentSnippet: A cooler inflation print reignited crypto risk appetite, lifting bitcoin above $110,000 while altcoins continued to underperform.

title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Gains 4%, Leading Index Higher
contentSnippet: Hedera (HBAR) was also a top performer, rising 3.5% from Thursday.

title: Coinbase Upgraded at JPMorgan, Seeing Potential $34B Opportunity in Base Token
contentSnippet: Analysts from the banking giant upgraded Coinbase to overweight from neutral and raised its price target on the stock to $404 from $342.

title: BNB Jumps, Sees 35% Volume Spike After Trump Pardons Binance Founder CZ
contentSnippet: Trading volume for BNB increased nearly 35% above its seven-day average, with market analysts suggesting the price movement reflects long-term accumulation.
